description.value:
With just over 6 years of experience in the Portuguese market, we share our DNA with more than 200 workers and position our offer according to 3 lines of service:

  • Strategy (Outsourcing, NeXel, Team as a Service, Tech Academies);
  • R&D (Bootcamps, POC, Tech Lab);
  • Nearshore.

 

In ADENTIS, we focus on PEOPLE. This is our emotional salary:

  • Great Work-Life balance;
  • Very flexible organizational routine;
  • Health benefits (for you and your family);
  • Team Building activities;
  • Over 300 protocols to offer you great discounts in different areas;
  • Continuous professional development sponsored by our Training and Certification Department;
  • Regular feedback on your performance through a personalized plan;
  • Comprehensive career plan and progression involving assertive performance reviews.

 

Objectives of this Role

  • Manage clients and partners;
  • Establish and grow relationships with appropriate stakeholders;
  • Maintain a forecast and targeting sales attainment plan;
  • Liaise with the best IT candidates out there.

 

Daily and Monthly Responsibilities

  • Market Prospection;
  • Create and maintain sales forecast and targeting sales attainment plans;
  • Liaise with a wide range of internal and external stakeholders;
  • Ensure your KPI’s are met or, preferably, overcome.

 

Skills and Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Business, Management, Engineering or related field;
  • Outstanding poise in a fast-paced business environment;
  • Excellent communication skills, oral and written;
  • Exceptional flexibility and problem solving skills;
  • Pressure is peanuts for you;
  • Perfect command of the English language. Extra marks for French.

 

Preferred Qualifications

  • Strong capabilities with database and information systems software;
  • Prior IT industry experience and up-to-date knowledge of relevant trends.

 

What’s in store for you

  • Great opportunity to build your career in the ever growing IT industry;
  • Develop your own business network;
  • Develop and grow your team from scratch;
  • Support of a great admin team, which will help you in every way possible;
  • Training and support from an experienced and accomplished Senior Management team;
  • Join a fast-growing IT firm with great career-growth prospects.

 

 

If you want to be part of a real People First organization, apply now! 

 

We walk with you!

REF: PSP.BM

 

 

At Adentis we defend equality and value diversity. We create a safe, diverse environment where opportunities are equal for all employees!

We do not discriminate based on age, ethnicity, sexual orientation, gender, disability or any factor other than merit.

All candidates with skills for the position are welcome!

Com mais de 7 anos de existência a nível nacional, contamos com mais de 200 colaboradores com o nosso ADN e posicionamo-nos no mercado com 3 ofertas de serviço:

  • Strategy (Outsourcing, NeXel, Team as a Service, Tech Academies);
  • R&D (Estágios, POC, Laboratório Tecnológico);
  • Nearshore.

 

Na ADENTIS centramo-nos nas PESSOAS e é este o nosso salário emocional:

  • Equilíbrio entre a vida profissional e pessoal;
  • Flexibilidade na rotina organizacional;
  • Benefícios de saúde para colaboradores e familiares;
  • Eventos Team Building;
  • Protocolo com mais de 300 parceiros;
  • Formação contínua através de um centro profissional de formação e certificação;
  • Acompanhamento e feedback contínuo através de um plano personalizado;
  • Progressão de carreira através de avaliações objetivas e diretas.

 

O que procuramos:

  • Licenciatura em Matemática aplicada, Informática de Gestão ou similar;
  • Experiência mínima de 2 anos em desenvolvimento Java ou Testes;
  • Conhecimentos sólidos e comprovados de SQL e desenvolvimento de Scripts à medida em SQL;
  • Conhecimentos sólidos e experiência comprovada no desenvolvimento de aplicações em Java;
  • JIRA, XRAY, Intellij, Selenium, Cucumber, GIT/Bitbucket, Confluence.
  • Experiência em frameworks de automação de testes (Cucumber, RobotFramework, etc);
  • Familiarizado com técnica de desenvolvimento orientada a testes (Ex: BDD);
  • Bom nível de inglês (falado e escrito).

 

Inovamos Contigo!

 

Se queres fazer parte de uma empresa People First, junta-te a nós.

 

We walk with you!

You should bring 3+ years of hands-on Level 1 and Level 2 IT Application Support for a business in a competitive environment.

Technical Proficiency:

  • Strong technical background in IT production, covering Linux, Windows, Oracle, SQL Server, WebSphere, Tomcat, Apache, and high availability setups;
  • Advanced Reporting skills in MS Excel or BI reports;
  • ITIL Certification (Preferred);
  • Experience with ServiceNow or equivalent ticketing tools.

Soft Skills:

  • Meticulous attention to detail, organizational prowess, and a results-driven mindset;
  • Critical thinking and analytical abilities for effective problem-solving;
  • A knack for developing and adapting processes for continuous improvement;
  • Excellent communication skills and the ability to manage/facilitate meetings, seminars, committees, and training sessions.

internalName: OPO - PSP - Junior IT Business Manager

description.value:
Are you driven, passionate, and eager to learn? Do you thrive in a dynamic environment and want to make a real impact? If so, ADENTIS has the perfect opportunity for you to launch your career in the exciting world of Tech!

 

With just over 7 years of experience in the Portuguese market, we share our DNA with more than 250 workers and position our offer according to 3 lines of service:

  • Strategy (Outsourcing, NeXel, Team as a Service, Tech Academies);
  • R&D (Bootcamps, POC, Tech Lab);
  • Nearshore.

 

In ADENTIS, we focus on PEOPLE. This is our emotional salary:

  • Great Work-Life balance;
  • Very flexible organizational routine;
  • Health benefits (for you and your family);
  • Team Building activities;
  • Over 300 protocols to offer you great discounts in different areas;
  • Continuous professional development sponsored by our Training and Certification Department;
  • Regular feedback on your performance through a personalized plan;
  • Comprehensive career plan and progression involving assertive performance reviews.

 

What will you do?

  • Connecting with potential clients and partners;
  • Building strong relationships and understanding their needs;
  • Creating and managing sales plans to hit our targets;
  • Identifying and engaging with top IT talent.

What are we looking for?

  • A Bachelor's degree in Business, Management, Engineering, or a related field;
